name: SuperDocs – The Ultimate Knowledge Base, Wiki And Documentation Builder
author: DoatKolom

sections.description:
The Knowledge Base WordPress Plugin is an easy-to-use tool for creating a comprehensive knowledge base for your website. It allows users to find answers quickly and easily by searching for topics or keywords. With its intuitive and user-friendly interface, this plugin helps you quickly and efficiently create a robust knowledge base for your website. It offers a variety of features, such as the ability to organize content into categories, a powerful search engine, and a flexible design that allows for easy updates and customization.

ðŸš€ Key features

  • Setup: Easy installation and setup within 5 minutes
  • Documents Limit: There is no limit to the number of documents you can write.
  • Multiple knowledge: You can create an unlimited product/topic knowledgebase there is no limit.
  • Search function: A search widget allows users to find the information they need within your knowledge base quickly.
  • Categories: Organizing your knowledge base content into categories can make it easier for users to navigate and find the information they need.
  • Customizable templates: The ability to customize the appearance of your knowledge bases, such as the layout and styling, can make it more visually appealing and easier to use.
  • Responsive design: Ensuring that your knowledge base is fully responsive and works well on mobile devices is important for providing a good user experience.
  • Table of contents: A table of contents that shows the structure and hierarchy of the knowledge base, making it easier for users to navigate and find relevant information.
  • PDF export: Users can export the knowledge base articles as PDFs
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.

Will it work with Gutenberg?

Now you can write the documentation with elementor and Gutenberg editor both.

But in the template, you can create only with elementor.

we are working with Gutenberg template compatibility, we will release it as soon as possible.
sections.changelog:
1.0.3-beta1 – 25th May 2023

  • Improved: JS and PHP code

1.0.2 – 03rd January 2023

  • Added: Document create modal
  • Added: Product create modal
  • Fixed: Template import issue
  • Fixed: Single docs permalink not updating issue
  • Improved: Remove unnecessary source code

1.0.0 – 28th December 2022

  • Initial release
